actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income interest on industrial development bonds the proceeds of which are to be used to provide facilities for the production of alcohol for use in the production of gasohol or other fuel.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income interest on industrial development bonds which are sold to finance facilities for the production of alcohol for use in the production of gasohol or other fuel.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income interest on industrial development bonds the proceeds of which are to be used to provide facilities for the production of alcohol for use in the production of gasohol or other fuel.
